metadata.title: USN-4962-1 -- Babel vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Babel incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4962-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-pybabel - 1.3+dfsg.1-2ubuntu2+esm1 python-babel-localedata - 1.3+dfsg.1-2ubuntu2+esm1 python-babel-doc - 1.3+dfsg.1-2ubuntu2+esm1 python-babel - 1.3+dfsg.1-2ubuntu2+esm1 python3-babel - 1.3+dfsg.1-2ubuntu2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
